p: A benevolent Artificial intelligence (AI)s knowledge graph and customizations bespoke to SARS-CoV-2 were used together to identify drugs that may halt the viral infection process. Baricitinib was expected to have a high binding affinity to AAK1 and cyclin G-associated kinase, another regulator of endocytosis [ 72]. Accordingly, baricitinib is suggested to be trialed on patients with SARS-CoV-2 acute respiratory disease in order to reduce the viral entry and the associated inflammation (NCT04321993).
